entry.source: {F812}Depressed woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}Hey, you've seen a girl, right? She{F801}looks teenaged, wears a school{F801}uniform...{F801}{F802}I remember... When I was sealed inside{F801}Tokyo, I was her age...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Depressed woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}It's just like 25 years ago... demons{F801}came to Tokyo and slaughtered so many{F801}people...{F801}{F802}If history is about to repeat itself,{F801}I wish the ceiling wasn't there so{F801}we could accept God's wrath...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Depressed woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}Someone created that ceiling...{F801}{F802}And then a champion arrived...{F801}{F802}But I'm the same as I was 25 years ago.{F801}I haven't grown up. I still just cling{F801}to the hope that someone will save me...{F801}

But hey,{F801}you won't hear me complaining.{F801}{F802}Everyone knows we're still alive today{F801}thanks to their stockpiles of stuff.{F801}{F802}Plus, the electricity they generate{F801}let us live in safety in these{F801}underground districts...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403002}I don't WANT to eat demon meat,{F801}of course...{F801}{F802}But we've eaten all the wild birds in{F801}the area already. We've got nothing{F801}else left...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403012}Those Jirae were living inside the{F801}Metropolitan Government Office before{F801}we were...{F801}{F802}I didn't want to see them kicked out{F801}if it could be avoided... I wish there{F801}was a peaceful way to solve it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403002}We used to joke about hunting demons{F801}to shore up our food supply...{F801}{F802}Now look us. We're the prey...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,118}{F813,1,403002}Demon meat is an important source of{F801}food for us. We have to hunt them if{F801}we want to survive...{F801}{F802}I'll go back to my regular job. I doubt{F801}I'll ever be the champion, but I can{F801}still work...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Depressed woman\0{F87A,61}{F813,1,403312}The Yakuza and those cultists are about{F801}to go to war, huh?{F801}{F802}Please... get me out of here! I don't{F801}want to stay in Tokyo anymore! I'm{F801}begging you, get me out of Tokyo...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai thug\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,404311}Rumor has it the guys at Florida have{F801}gone up above the ceiling.{F801}{F802}I hear they used demons to dig through{F801}the Sky Tower's ceiling.{F801}{F802}They even brought in a Terminal they{F801}found somewhere.{F801}{F802}I guess one of them, the guy in charge{F801}used to be a military dude.{F801}
